Name: Secrets of the Middle Ages
About the game: Secrets of the Middle Ages is a classic puzzle game in which you are invited to find certain items in the game room. Walk through the bright and colorful locations of a luxurious medieval castle in search of various items ! Features: - Casual gameplay; - The game is suitable for people of any age; - Colorful locations; - Easy mouse control; - Relaxing music.
